function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'heap_sort' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function 'heap_down' to reach function 'heap_sort'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i >= 0' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i >= 0' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i > 1' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i > 1' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i >= 0' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i > 1' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'a (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'b (line 3)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 't' remain in use at the end of function 'swap'?
Does variable 'b' remain in use at the end of function 'swap'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'int a[10] = {3,1,5,8, 9, 4, 6};' be considered dead code?
Can the program actually reach the statement: “*b = t;”?
